title: 93/576/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 October 1993 amending Commission Decision 93/402/EEC concerning animal health conditions and veterinary certification for imports of fresh meat from South American countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 October 1993 amending Commission Decision 93/402/EEC concerning animal health conditions and veterinary certification for imports of fresh meat from South American countries
(93/576/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Member States shall not authorize the importation of fresh meat, originating from the States of Sao Paulo and Minas Gerais (Brazil) produced and certified after 1 June 1994.
Member States shall authorize the importation of fresh meat, originating from those States produced and certified before 2 June 1994, until 15 June 1994.

The provisions of Decision 93/463/EEC are repealed.
Annex I to Commission Decision 93/402/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1993.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 179, 22. 7. 1993, p. 11.
(4) OJ No L 216, 26. 8. 1993, p. 22.
